---
name: Add New Tool
about: Give a request to add new tool.
title: ''
labels: 'newtool'
assignees: ''

---

## Add Information like this:
```json
{
	"name": "NAME OF YOUR TOOL",
	"url": "URL OF YOUR TOOL",
	"image": "view-source:https://github.com/USERNAME/TOOL_NAME in find twitter:image",
	"title": "GITHUB DESCRIPTION",
	"tags": ["USERNAME", "WRITTEN_IN_PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE", "RELEATED_TAGS_OF_YOUR_TOOL"]
}
```

## Real Example:
```json
{
    "name": "portmap",
    "url": "https://github.com/rix4uni/portmap",
    "image": "https://opengraph.githubassets.com/80cd534f0462fd207132ff848ee27ffe35fed515ec441e3ac7587f6190d4c031/rix4uni/portmap",
    "title": "portmap is a fast portscan tool, uses shodan public data for port scan used internetdb.shodan.io and api.shodan.io/shodan/host",
    "tags": ["rix4uni", "golang", "portscanner"]
}
```
